meta.name: description
meta.content: Thomasville City Schools is located at 400 Turner Street, Thomasville, NC 27360 and comprises of Bulldog Academy, Liberty Drive Elementary School, and Thomasville High School, Middle School, and Elementary School.

h3.a: Dr. Gentry's Letter to Families & Students on March 25, 2020

div.div:
Click the green button to read full story to view the letter from the Superintendent regarding what to expect now that school is closed for students until May 15, 2020.
**Grab and go meal pick up for the week will be Monday, April 20th from 8am-4pm at Thomasville Primary School.

article.aria-label: Do you need help finding food for your child?

img.alt: text FOODNC to 877-877 or call 2-1-1 for food assistance

h3.a: Do you need help finding food for your child?

div.div: Text FOODNC to 877-877 or call 2-1-1 for help.
Students: Do you need technology help or do you need to talk to a counselor? We have hotlines for that.

div.div: Catch up on what you missed at the March Thomasville City Schools Board of Education Meeting on March 2, 2020.
Every minute of every day counts!
We want your input regarding board policies that are currently in draft form.
Set up your Parent Portal account to check your student's grades, schedule, attendance and more!

article.aria-label: Drive the Future - Become a TCS School Bus Driver

h3.a: Drive the Future - Become a TCS School Bus Driver

div.div: Contact the Human Resources department for more info.
What is Bulldog Nation? Watch this video to see how Thomasville students and staff explain what Bulldog Nation is all about.

It is our mission in Thomasville City Schools to partner with parents, community and staff members to nurture and
prepare students for success in the 21st Century. Educating the whole child and providing them with the tools needed for success in life is paramount. Expectations for a positive learning environment along with rigor, relevance, and relationship building will ensure success for all students.
